Text: I am seeding this in Utorrent but it still shows 0 seeds here on this site? Am I doing something wrong?

You're doing it right. The number of seeds isn't updated immediately, it takes some time.

Just keep seeding and check the number tomorrow. You might be surprised.
yes I see that it has already gone up now - THANKS!
You should include a detailed list of the books that are in it.

Great Idea, sorry I didn't do that! Now It seems like I cant edit the torrents description? It says "edit temporarily unavailable"? I am not even sure if the list would fit in the description, but maybe I can post a link to a list here in the comments. Thanks again though - With a little help from you guys I am sure to improve on my torrents in the future! ;peace

Here is the list of PDFs in this torrent: http://justpaste.it/8dw

Sorry again I didn't get it in the description ;)

;peace
BTW there are 121 PDFs not 140! 140 was including the "Supplemental" folder files too... My Bad!
